name: UpdateCampaignFeedback
description:
Update specific feedback for a Mailchimp campaign.

Use this tool to update a particular feedback message for a specific Mailchimp marketing campaign. This is useful when corrections or additional details need to be added to existing feedback.

parameters.name: campaign_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the Mailchimp campaign to be updated.

value_schema.description: The unique id for the campaign.

parameters.name: feedback_message_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the specific feedback message to update in the campaign.

value_schema.description: The unique id for the feedback message.

parameters.name: editable_block_id
parameters.description: The ID of the editable block that the feedback addresses within the campaign.

value_schema.description: The block id for the editable block that the feedback addresses.

parameters.name: feedback_message
parameters.description: The text content of the feedback message to be updated.

parameters.name: feedback_is_complete
parameters.description: Indicates if the feedback is marked as complete. Use true for complete and false for incomplete.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Mailchimp Marketing API.

parameters.name: campaign_id
parameters.description: The unique id for the campaign.

value_schema.description: The unique id for the campaign.

parameters.name: feedback_id
parameters.description: The unique id for the feedback message.

value_schema.description: The unique id for the feedback message.

parameters.name: block_id
parameters.description: The block id for the editable block that the feedback addresses.

value_schema.description: The block id for the editable block that the feedback addresses.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
